subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Thomas Voeckler won the 10th stage of the Tour de France, but the most striking feature of the stage, aside from the course, was an early attack.
snippet: Thomas Voeckler won the 10th stage of the Tour de France, but the most striking feature of the stage, aside from the course, was an early attack.
